title: | Video | Ben Stokes hits jackpot at IPL 2017 auction | Cricket Videos | - India Today
text:
Ben Stokes hits jackpot at IPL 2017 auction Rohan Sen | February 20, 2017 Next Video Chennai: Two minors sexually assaulted, bodies found in dump yards Embed Feedback 
England all-rounder Ben Stokes was sold to Rising Pune Supergiants for Rs 14.50 crore in the Indian Premier League auction held in Bangalore on Monday. Stokes is one of the most destructive players in world cricket but not many would have expected him to fetch such a high price given that he would not be available for the entire season.Stokes' English teammates Tymal Mills and Chris Woakes also bagged good deals. Afghanistan cricketers Mohammad Nabi and Rashid Khan were bought by defending champions Sunrisers Hyderabad in an action-packed auction Watch Right Now
